Quiz App

12 Feb 2016

Quiz App

Create your own quiz with

10 or more questions.

If you have the user enter non-numeric answers, think and cover thdifferent ways a user could enter a correct answer.

For example, if the answer is “a”would “A” also be acceptable?

Let the user know if she gets the question correct. Print a messagdepending on the user's answer.</p

Extension: For a 4...

Figure out how to add up correct answers and tell the user hescore.
